reviewText:
i would like to know if there is more music performance or there are a bunch
of interviews or talking on this dvd..THE SECOND REVIEW said something about
performances not being complete. I want music and not a whole bunch of talking.

This video is NOT 60 minutes, as stated, but "approx. 45 minutes" the same as the "A Life In Music" DVD also listed with Amazon.

It is truly a problem when Amazon does not have accurate information for the products it lists for sale.

Now I have two copies of this identical documentary with the same people praising Chet Atkins, who truly was a master at the guitar.

I didn't realize that there were no complete performances on the DVD, but I enjoyed the views of the various artists. I was amazed to find that Chet influenced such a wide array of people in the music world. I was familiar with most of the artists, but one of the coolest things for me was discovering Tommy Emmanuel, another great guitarist!
I've been a fan of Chet Atkins for as long as I can remember...over 60 years! So sorry when he passed away, but he cetainly left a great legacy of music and new stars.
